jobName: 資訊｜後端實習生｜Ruby on Rails
description:
陽光伏特家是台灣第一個也是目前規模最大的全民電廠平台，我們打破過往民眾參與再生能源的高門檻，讓民眾也能簡單成為再生能源的創造者，「讓所有人簡單地，在環境行動中找到經濟價值。」

同時，我們也是台灣第一間取得再生能源售電業執照的能源業者。協助國內大、中、小型企業取得綠電，進而迎接國內外淨零減碳浪潮，讓台灣企業在世界舞台更有競爭力。
我們不斷以創新的商業模式，突破再生能源產業的框架，期待的，就是讓能源永續逐漸走入台灣民眾的日常，讓更多人，成為台灣能源轉型的一份子。

【關於程式開發團隊】
在陽光伏特家不管你是正職或是實習伙伴，都可以接觸到團對最核心的策略討論。在開發上，我們也提供了充足的訓練以及實戰經驗。隨著平台的擴大，程式系統也越來越複雜。為了解決複雜的系統架構問題，我們甚至開發了專屬的gem來符合DDD（domain-driven design）的開發流程。

【工作內容】
1. 學習並參與開發和維護後端服務，主要使用 Ruby on Rails 框架進行開發
2. 參與需求規格討論，協助進行資料庫設計、程式架構規劃
3. 協助或參與Code Review、Testing、Debug，交付高品質程式碼

【具備特質】
不是程式高手? 沒關係，但你一定具有下面的特質！
1. 有自己的想法，並與團隊主動溝通
2. 熱愛各種新技術，但也不執著，願意尋求各種不熟悉的技術解決問題
3. 願意主動規劃並領導團隊解決發現的問題
4. 熱愛學習，重視自我能力精進經常思考。隨時想著"除個這個解法外，有更好的做法嗎?"

**此職務為論件計酬**

我們在尋找專業的人資寫手，共同打造知識型部落格，為人資夥伴提供最新的產業趨勢、法規更新及專業洞察。希望你運用豐富的人資知識與流暢的文字能力，為有福企部落格撰寫高品質的文章，提升網站搜尋曝光，建立影響力。

jobName: 【寵物科技公司】Warehouse Operations Intern 倉儲營運實習生
description:
【Application Channel】
Please apply via: https://grnh.se/267b087a3us

【About the role】
We are looking for a proactive and detail-oriented Warehouse  Intern to join our Operations team. This internship offers a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in global inventory operations and process optimization within a fast-growing international pet tech company.

You’ll work closely with our supply chain team to understand how warehouse operations and system processes support global e-commerce fulfillment. Interns may also have the opportunity to explore supply chain data and support in simple data analysis projects based on their background and learning progress.

【 What you'll do 】
• Global Inventory Operations
  - Assist in maintaining and updating global inventory records using Google Sheets
  - Support with downloading and reconciling inventory data from Amazon and our ERP system
• Payment Application Support
  - Help in submitting and managing warehouse-related payment applications within the ERP system
• Process & Documentation Support
  - Assist in updating and standardizing warehouse-related SOPs in our internal documentation system
  - Support small-scale process improvements or system enhancements under guidance

• (Optional Based on Skills)
  - If capable, support in simple data cleaning or preparation for supply chain performance tracking
  - May assist in building basic dashboards using tools such as Tableau (training will be provided if applicable)

【What You Will Learn】
• How global e-commerce companies manage multi-country warehouse and logistics networks
• How ERP systems and Google Sheets are used to track and manage inventory
• A foundational understanding of supply chain operations, including how sales, inventory, and warehouse planning are connected
• Potential exposure to supply chain data projects and visualization tools depending on skillset

【Who you are】
• Basic proficiency in Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets
• Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
• Proactive and eager to learn, with the ability to ask questions when needed
• Interest in global operations, supply chain and warehouse management
• Experience with planning, documentation, or coordination is a plus
• Familiarity with Tableau or data visualization tools is a plus but not required

【Perks 】
• The rare opportunity to work with an international team from Taiwan HQ and make impact on a global scale
• Join a group of talents who have passion to change pet parents and pet's lives through technology
• The freedom to voice yourself in an open, trusting and transparent working environment
• Quarterly all hands meetings to update entire organization on company goals, strategic directions and the opportunity to openly ask questions/give feedback
• Bring your fur babies to work in a pet-friendly office space designed to make your pet feel relaxed and comfortable
• Join our volunteer program. We are passionate about giving back to society.
• Various club activities to cultivate interests and have fun with Tomofuners after work!
• A LOT of free snacks and drinks for humans and furkids!
• Comfortable and creative office with kitchen, sofa, and quiet areas. Everyone can find their ideal place to work!
• Afternoon tea time twice a month and monthly birthday parties. We celebrate all the happy moments together.
 
【 Benefits 】
• Flexible working hours and work-from-home when needed!
• Monthly onsite health service.
• Internal training workshops and external training subsidies for you to expand your skill set and continuously learn and grow.

jobName: 【2025 Infineon Intern Program】Hardware Design Engineer Intern
description:
The Intern Program in Taiwan is a 1-year program designed to provide a comprehensive and engaging experience for interns, while also cultivating a mindset among managers to develop and nurture emerging talent within the organization. The program will start from 1 July and will focus on building a strong foundation for interns to grow and develop their skills, with the goal of retaining high-potential interns as internal employees.

Responsibilities:

In your new role, you will:
•	Work on developing hardware for next-generation IoT Wi-Fi/BT combo chips.
•	Engage in schematics drawing and layout review to design hardware.
•	Apply your RF knowledge and matching expertise to ensure optimal performance.
•	Participate in post-silicon bring-up activities to validate and optimize hardware designs.
•	Help with front-end evaluation, RF bench testing, setting up test stations, lab maintenance, and creating technical documentation.

Qualifications:

You are best equipped for this task if you have:
•	Fourth-year university / Second-year master students or Current graduates

Technical and Professional Skills:
1.	Hands-on Interest: Eager to get hands-on experience in hardware board design with WLAN/BT combo solutions.
2.	RF Knowledge: Strong interest and some knowledge in RF for WLAN/BT, OFDM/OFDMA, MIMO, and front-end matching.
3.	Equipment Familiarity: Basic understanding of using spectrum analyzers, signal generators, network analyzers, power meters, and attenuators.
4.	Design Tools: Willingness to learn and use board design tools like OrCAD, Allegro, ADS, and other RF/PI/SI simulation tools.
5.	Communication Skills: Good communication and interpersonal skills to help debug issues, optimize RF matching, and document your work.
6.	Problem-Solving: Basic experience or interest in resolving technical issues and working collaboratively in a team.
